thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Experience!
thread.title_full: Great Experience! - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: BelleVic
title: Great Experience!
text: The whole family had a great time staying in the hotel. Quick, hazzle free check in/out. Beautiful , very clean and spacious family room. The food - breakfast was amazing -my kids loved it. Great location to almost everything- restaurants, shopping area and only 10 mins walk to Victoria Station and few minutes away from Pimlico tube. Above all, the staff are excellent esp the Duty Manager -Mr Sachen! We will definitely come back and would recommend this hotel.
